text.text: Superset is your AI coding assistant - spin up cloud agents, plan tasks, do code reviews, and more, all without leaving Slack.

*DM the bot* - Start a direct message with Superset for instant access to AI assistance.

*@mention in channels* - Mention @Superset in any channel to get help in context.

*Link unfurling* - Paste a Superset task link and it will automatically preview in the conversation.
